title: What were the Wimbledon results?

Wimbledon

What were the Wimbledon results?

Cash/Glasspool and Hijikata/Pel advance to doubles final

July 10, 2025

Ezra Shaw/Getty Images

Wimbledon main-draw action runs until 13 July. By ATP Staff

Home favourites Julian Cash and Lloyd Glasspool advanced to the Wimbledon doubles final on Thursday. They will next meet Rinky Hijikata and David Pel, who upset top seeds Marcelo Arevalo and Mate Pavic.

View Thursday's featured results from the All England Club below and click here to see all scores.

Centre Court
[13] Amanda Anisimova (USA) def. [1] Aryna Sabalenka 6-4, 4-6, 6-4
[8] Iga Swiatek (POL) def. Belinda Bencic (SUI) 6-2, 6-0
Sem Verbeek/Katerina Siniakova def. Joe Salisbury/Luisa Stefani 7-6(3), 7-6(3)

No. 1 Court
Rinky Hijikata/David Pel def. [1] Marcelo Arevalo/Mate Pavic 6-7(2), 7-6(5), 7-6(9)
[5] Julian Cash/Lloyd Glasspool def. [4] Marcel Granollers/Horacio Zeballos 6-3, 6-4

 Djokovic cancels on-site practice ahead of SF vs. Sinner
